scripts.doc: typedoc --excludeNotExported --out doc/ --module commonjs --target ES5 --name 'Most Proxy' src/index.ts
scripts.postdoc: git add doc/ && git commit -m 'chore(docs): build doc/'
scripts.test: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-ci: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run test-node && testem ci
scripts.dist: rimraf dist/ && mkdirp dist && npm run lib && browserify lib/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone mostProxy --exclude most --outfile dist/most-proxy.js && uglifyjs dist/most-proxy.js -o dist/most-proxy.min.js
scripts.postdist: git add dist/ && git commit -m 'chore(dist): build dist/'
scripts.prerelease: npm run doc && npm run dist && npm run changelog
scripts.release-patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch -m "chore(release): release new version"
scripts.release-minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor -m "chore(release): release new version"
scripts.release-major: npm run prerelease && npm version major -m "chore(release): release new version"
